title: Don't Leave Me
overview: Gu Man Qing couldn't stand her husband Shen Jun's long-term domestic violence, so she faked her death to escape. Later, she met the plastic surgeon Wen Yi Huai and begged him to change her face. Wen Yi Huai agreed and asked Gu Man Qing to pretend to be his deceased wife. Unexpectedly, Shen Jun found out, and the three of them started a thrilling game of chase and escape.
